fixes.name: FACE T-1
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR DateX = SELECTEDVALUE('Date X (comparison date)'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustom,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MAX_DATE -1day] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Face],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        DateX = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Face],
        0
    )
)
